mapper.select: SELECT SUB_CATEGORY_NAME FROM SUB_CATEGORY ORDER BY MAIN_CATEGORY_ID, SUB_CATEGORY_ID

SELECT sub.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, COALESCE(SUM(s.AMOUNT), 0) as TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM SUB_CATEGORY sub LEFT JOIN SAVING s ON s.SUB_CATEGORY_ID = sub.SUB_CATEGORY_ID AND s.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND YEAR(s.SAVING_YMD) = #{year} AND MONTH(s.SAVING_YMD) = #{month} GROUP BY sub.SUB_CATEGORY_ID, sub.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME HAVING TOTAL_AMOUNT > 0 ORDER BY TOTAL_AMOUNT DESC
